Class.name: TK.Zen.About
Class.Description: Created using the page template: TK.Zen.TemplatePage

Parameter.name: APPLICATION
Parameter.Description: Class name of application this page belongs to.

Parameter.name: CURRENTMENUITEM
Parameter.Description: Id of the menu item that should be current when displaying this page

XData.name: Style
XData.Description: This Style block contains page-specific CSS style definitions.
XData.Data:
<style type="text/css">

#aboutGroup div {
	text-align:		center;
	margin-top: 	4px;
	margin-bottom:	4px;
}

#aboutGroup span {
	font-size:		14px;
}

div#lSEA {
	margin-top:	12px;
}

#lSEA span {
	font-size:		18px;
}

div#lDisclaimer {
	text-align:		justify;
	margin-left:	6px;
}

#lDisclaimer span {
	margin-left:	0px;
	font-size:		12px;
}

</style>

XData.name: ContentPane
XData.Description: This XML block defines the contents of this pane.
XData.Data: <pane xmlns="http://www.intersystems.com/zen" xmlns:tk="http://www.intersystems.com/sweden/TK"> <vgroup id="aboutGroup" width="480"> <label id="lTK" /> <label id="lBrowsers1" /> <label id="lBrowsers2" /> <label id="lDisclaimer" /> <label id="lBlames" /> </vgroup> </pane>

Method.name: onloadHandler
Method.Description: Loads the actual About box content. All these guys are translatable.
Method.Implementation:
zenSetProp('lTK', 'value', 'Service Catalog
Version ' + this.TKVersion) zenSetProp('lBrowsers1', 'value', 'The visual appearance of this software
has been developed with the following browsers:
Safari 5.1+
Firefox 8.0+
Chrome 35+
Internet Explorer 8+') zenSetProp('lBrowsers2', 'value', '') zenSetProp('lDisclaimer', 'value', 'Disclaimer: Please make sure that you understand that this specific software, Service Catalog, is being provided freely, and that no kind of agreement or contract is created between you and the developers of this software and anyone else who is in any way connected with this software subject to your claims against them directly. Granting a rigth to use this software does not create or imply any contractual or extracontractual liability on the part of the developers of this software.') zenSetProp('lBlames', 'value', 'All blames about this software may be addressed to janne.sillanpaa@intersystems.com') this.invokeSuper('onloadHandler');
